Title: Clover IM
Description: Clover IM must be a powerfull ICQ messanger. It's developing in C# and using Windows Presentation Foudation. To use Oscar protocol it use own library, called OscarClover.

Project Description
Clover IM must be a powerfull ICQ messanger. It's developing in C# and using Windows Presentation Foudation. To use Oscar protocol it use own library, called OscarClover.

Now we are working ONLY with OscarClover-library to use Oscar protocol!!
